## R Markdown

### Using data from pinfsc50: these plots work
```{r code}
library(vcfR)
pkg <- "pinfsc50"
vcf_file <- system.file("extdata", "pinf_sc50.vcf.gz", package = pkg)
vcf <- read.vcfR( vcf_file, verbose = FALSE )
chrom <- create.chromR(name='Supercontig', vcf=vcf )
plot(chrom)


```

### Using my own data: these plots do not work
```{r my data}
clarkiamodified <- read.vcfR("Data/clarkiamodified.vcf", verbose = FALSE)
chrom2 <- create.chromR(name='SuperScaffold100095', vcf= clarkiamodified)
plot(chrom2)
```
